column4: A friend of mine is going to try Ubuntu on his powerpc, I'm a Gentoo user, does ubuntu have something comparable to portage? If so, can you point me in the direction of some documentation on how to use ubuntus package manager? Thanks.
ah, is there a documentation page on apt?
it works pretty much the same as portage without the compile wait time
apt-get update (fetches updated package lists from the repositories) apt-get update (downloads and installs all updated software on your system)
